|brand = Motorola Solutions |model = AP 6521 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = enterprise access point |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = UZ7AP6 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR7161; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24K |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 680<!-- 680 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;; |flash1size = <!-- Size of flash --> |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Micron;; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM54610; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 5C:0E:8B |oui = 5C:0E:8B
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = <!-- DC Volts --> |pwr_amp_dc = <!-- DC Amps --> |pwr_vac = <!-- AC Volts --> |pwr_ac_hz = <!-- AC Hertz --> |pwr_amp_ac = <!-- AC Amps --> |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = <!-- Connector Type --> |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/02/2011 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B007YW627W |asin_country = US |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Motorola Solutions RM6 |rad1modif = Mini PCIe (oversized) |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9220; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Noted models=== *AP-6521-60010-US, aka NCAP-500 (integral antennae) :FCC ID: UZ7AP6, OUI: 5C:0E:8B
==Links of Interest== [http://www.motorolasolutions.com/web/Business/Products/Wireless%20LAN%20Devices/WLAN%20Access%20Points/AP6521/_documents/_staticfiles/AP+6521_SS_0511.pdf Spec sheet]
==See also== ===Models=== *[[Motorola Solutions AP 7161]] - 802.11n Outdoor Access Point :Tri 802.11n Radios (Band Unlocked), 3x3:2 MIMO :26dBm Max Composite Transmit Power, 1x GbE Ports :NEMA 4x Enclosure, Controller Independent *[[Motorola Solutions AP 7131N]] - 802.11n Indoor Access Point :Tri 802.11n Radios (Band Unlocked), 3x3:2 MIMO :27.7dBm Max Composite Transmit Power, 2x GbE Ports :Controller Independent, Virtual Controller Capable :*CPU: [[Cavium]] Octeon Plus CN5010 (@500MHz 1-cores MIPS64 SoC) :*WLAN: [[Atheros]] AR9160, 802.11abgn 2x MIMO 3x3, PCI (68-pin) :*RAM: 128MB (DDR2), OS: Wing 5.4 ([https://geektimes.ru/post/286062/ Review]) *[[Motorola Solutions AP 6532]] - 802.11n Indoor Access Point :Dual 802.11n Radios (Band Unlocked), 2x3:2 MIMO ([https://hsto.org/getpro/habr/comment_images/6dc/c57/bbf/6dcc57bbf4d2262ed4df899ec98bf48d.jpg PCB image]) :24dBm Max Composite Transmit Power, 1x GbE Port :Controller Independent, Virtual Controller Capable *[[Motorola Solutions AP 6521]] - 802.11n Indoor Access Point :Single 802.11n Radio (Band Unlocked), 2x2:2 MIMO :30dBm Max Composite Transmit Power, 1x GbE Port :Controller Independent, Virtual Controller Capable *[[Motorola Solutions AP 6511]] - 802.11n Modular/Wallplate Access Point :Single 802.11n Radio (Band Unlocked), 2x2:2 MIMO :26dBm Max Composite Transmit Power, 1x GbE Port :Optional 3x Fast Ethernet Module (Pass-through) :Controller Independent, Virtual Controller Capable *[[Motorola Solutions AP 650]] - 802.11n Indoor Access Point :Dual 802.11n Radios (Band Unlocked), 2x3:2 MIMO :24dBm Max Composite Transmit Power, 1x GbE Port :Controller Dependent *[[Motorola Solutions AP 621]] - 802.11n Indoor Access Point :Single 802.11n Radio (Band Unlocked), 2x2:2 MIMO :24dBm Max Composite Transmit Power, 1x GbE Port :Atheros chipset (that supports granular spectrum analysis with ADSP) :Controller Dependent
[[Category:English Documentation]]
